title: The Paradox of Choice - Featuring Sean Famoso - Co-Founder of LVRN
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, we’re joined by Sean Famoso, Co-Founder of Atlanta-based Music Label and Artist Management Company - Love Renaissance (LVRN). Home to Summer Walker, Shelley FKA DRAM, 6LACK and DVSN, to name a few. We discuss the process of having a big dream and seeing it through without funding, building a business-model at the intersection of mental health and creativity, learning to work with artists experiencing anxiety and depression, the paradox of choice - and much much more. 

Find Sean Famoso online:
Twitter - @SeanFamoso https://twitter.com/SeanFamoso
Instagram - @SeanFamoso https://www.instagram.com/seanfamoso

Follow LVRN:
Twitter - @lvrn https://twitter.com/lvrn
Instagram - @lvrngram https://www.instagram.com/lvrngram

Black Business of the Week - https://www.italeisure.com

Have a GREAT day!
